James Bromley Spicer (May 12, 1958 na September 27, 2019) bụ onye America na-edekọ egwu hip hop nke wepụtara ọtụtụ egwú rap ochie n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980 gụnyere "Dollar Bill Y'all," nke a maara ya nkè ọma.  Ọ bụ Russell Simmons 'Rush Management na-achịkwa Spicer
Otu égwu ya "The Bubble Bunch" gosipụtara remix mbụ nke Jellybean Benitez.
Spicer nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị anọ, Angelina, Leticia, Janel, na Princess na otu nwa nwoke, James.
N'afọ 2018, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ na akpa ume. Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 27, 2019, mgbè ọ dị afọ 61.
